## SimStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [SimStore](./lib-base.simstore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SimStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.simstore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./lib-base.simstorelistenerparams.newstate.md) | [SimStoreState](./lib-base.simstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
|  [oldState](./lib-base.simstorelistenerparams.oldstate.md) | [SimStoreState](./lib-base.simstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire new state. |
|  [stateChange](./lib-base.simstorelistenerparams.statechange.md) | Partial&lt;[SimStoreState](./lib-base.simstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | Only the state variables that have changed. |
